arts.ttl: Serie A leader Napoli beats Lecce 1-0, Camarda in tears after missed penalty
arts.sum: Frank Anguissa scored the only goal of the match at Lecce after Napoli goalkeeper Vanja Milinkovic-Savic had saved a penalty from teenager Francesco Camarda. Despite mounting injury problems, Napoli moved clear at the top of Serie A with a 1-0 win at Lecce on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Antonio Conte takes shot at Inter after win over Lecce: “We are not stupid”
arts.sum: The war of words between Antonio Conte and the Inter camp appears far from over. Following Napoli’s crucial 1-0 victory over Lecce, Conte launched a pointed critique of the…

arts.ttl: Lecce vs Napoli: the midweek round begins
arts.sum: The two sides have met 20 times in Lecce, with honours relatively even: the Giallorossi have claimed five victories (most recently a 2-1 triumph in the 2010/11 campaign), eight fixtures have ended level (the last being a 1-1 stalemate in 2008/09), while the Partenopei have prevailed on seven occasions (including a 2-0 success in the 2024/25 season). Lecce host Napoli at the Via del Mare as they look to bounce back from their defeat against Udinese, which brought an end to their three-game unbeaten run.
